member.name: IDXGIOutputDuplication.GetDesc
member.summary: Retrieves a description of a duplicated output. This description specifies the dimensions of the surface that contains the desktop image.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes the duplicated output. This parameter must not be NULL.

member.name: IDXGIOutputDuplication
member.summary: The IDXGIOutputDuplication interface accesses and manipulates the duplicated desktop image.
